import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';//use redux for track imgs rendered state
export var slice=createSlice({name:'appStates',initialState:{imgsRendered:false,spinnerIsShowing:true,childRootIsShowing:false,pageTitle:'Code Adventures Reminder'},reducers:{//togglers for states
imgsRenderedSetState:function imgsRenderedSetState(state){if(state.imgsRendered){state.imgsRendered=false;}else{state.imgsRendered=true;}},spinnerIsShowingSetState:function spinnerIsShowingSetState(state){if(state.spinnerIsShowing){state.spinnerIsShowing=false;}else{state.spinnerIsShowing=true;}},childRootIsShowingSetState:function childRootIsShowingSetState(state){if(state.childRootIsShowing){state.childRootIsShowing=false;}else{state.childRootIsShowing=true;}},setPageTitle:function setPageTitle(state,title){state.pageTitle=title.payload;}}});//export selectors
export var selectImgsRendered=function selectImgsRendered(state){return state.appStates.imgsRendered;};export var selectSpinnerIsShowing=function selectSpinnerIsShowing(state){return state.appStates.spinnerIsShowing;};export var selectChildRootIsShowing=function selectChildRootIsShowing(state){return state.appStates.childRootIsShowing;};export var selectpageTitle=function selectpageTitle(state){return state.appStates.pageTitle;};//export actions
var _slice$actions=slice.actions,imgsRenderedSetState=_slice$actions.imgsRenderedSetState,spinnerIsShowingSetState=_slice$actions.spinnerIsShowingSetState,childRootIsShowingSetState=_slice$actions.childRootIsShowingSetState,setPageTitle=_slice$actions.setPageTitle;export{imgsRenderedSetState,spinnerIsShowingSetState,childRootIsShowingSetState,setPageTitle};export default slice.reducer;
